forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny to partly cloudy. High 18C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and a few afternoon clouds. High around 65F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low around 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.title: Thursday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 56F. SE winds shifting to WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 7C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
